mainBoard.name: Team Avatar

rulings.text: A creature attacks alone if it's the only creature declared as an attacker during the declare attackers step (including creatures controlled by your teammates, if applicable). For example, Team Avatar's triggered ability won't trigger if you attack with multiple creatures and all but one of them are removed from combat.
Similarly, the damage dealt by Team Avatar's activated ability is calculated during the resolution of the ability.
The value of X is determined only as Team Avatar's triggered ability begins to resolve. It won't change later in the turn if the number of creatures you control changes.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
{2}{W}, Discard this card: It deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: Outside the sanctuary of Ba Sing Se's walls, humble Earth Kingdom villages hope to stave off the news of war for just one more day.

foreignData.flavorText: Par-delà les murs du sanctuaire de Ba Sing Se, les modestes bourgades du Royaume de la Terre espèrent ne pas entendre parler de la guerre ne serait-ce qu'un jour de plus.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère

foreignData.flavorText: Außerhalb der heiligen Mauern von Ba Sing Se hoffen die bescheidenen Dörfer des Erdkönigreichs, die Kunde vom Krieg noch einen weiteren Tag von sich fernhalten zu können.
